title: Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641, Premium Hand Protection from Welder and Cutting Torch Heat, Commercial Quality, Cotton Lined, Gauntlet Cuff, Unisex, Grey, One Size
descriptions:
Introducing the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 - Your Ultimate Shield Against Welding and Torch Heat!

Experience unrivaled hand protection with these commercial-quality welding gloves, designed for both men and women. The KH641 gloves are crafted from premium split cowhide grade A leather, ensuring durability and toughness for all your welding projects. The exterior is not just heat-resistant, but also provides a robust defense against flames and chemicals.

The interior is lined with soft cotton fleece, offering a comfortable and breathable environment for your hands. The gloves feature a fully welted design with lock-stitch construction, using Kevlar stitching material for added strength and longevity.

One of the standout features of these gloves is the winged thumb design, providing exceptional flexibility and precision during MIG and stick welding applications. The gauntlet cuff style, with a length of 13.5 inches, ensures maximum coverage and protection for your arms.

These unisex welding gloves are available in one size fits most, making them a versatile choice for any welder. The classic gray color adds a professional touch to your welding gear. Each package contains one pair of these premium welding gloves.

Don't compromise on safety or comfort. Choose the Lincoln Electric Leather Welding Gloves KH641 for a superior welding experience. Protect your hands from the heat, flames, and chemicals with these heavy-duty, commercial-quality gloves. Order yours today!
